text: Its sturdy granite walls are adorned with maritime reliefs, and reminds all who pass of the toll's crucial role in sustaining the realm of Calith.
Bustling hub where merchants from across realms gather to negotiate tolls, their voices creating a symphony of commerce that resonates within the polished marble corridors.

Crowning the toll building, the Summit Watchtower reaches skyward, granting tollkeepers an eagle-eyed advantage to survey land and sea, ensuring no vessel or scheme escapes their vigilant scrutiny from the highest point in all of Calith.
